short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free access to 100's of teacher-created resources for IM 6-8 Math.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using RESOURCIFY is Easy! Just

1. Install the Extension

2. Visit any IM Math curriculum page at Illustrative Mathematics, Open Up, or Kendall Hunt. 

3. Click the Icon
  When RESOURCIFY has found resources, the icon will light up blue.  After you click on the icon you'll be able to

4. View all of the resources available for that page from RESOURCIFY

------------------

PRIVACY NOTICE: 

Not logged in -- RESOURCIFY does not collect *any* personal information nor fill out anything on your webpage. We do record the following events anonymously: pages visited with RESOURCIFY resources and actions taken within the RESOURCIFY extension.

Logged in -- RESOURCIFY requires a valid email address and user information to log in.  We only record information about which pages you have visited with RESOURCIFY resources, RESOURCIFY content that has been personalized by you, and the actions taken within the RESOURCIFY extension. RESOURCIFY does not fill out anything on your webpage.
